title: Eleven-Headed Kannon
medium: Wood with lacquer, gold leaf, and metal decoration
dimensions:
Overall (figure): H. 78 3/8 in. (199.1 cm); W. 21 1/2 in. (54.6 cm); D. 23 1/8 in. (58.7 cm)
Overall (figure with base):  H. 92 1/4 in. (234.5 cm); W. 30 3/8 in. (77.2 cm); D. 25 1/2 in. (64.8 cm)
Overall (total with halo): H. 93 1/4 in. (236.9 cm)
creditLine: The Harry G. C. Packard Collection of Asian Art, Gift of Harry G. C. Packard, and Purchase, Fletcher, Rogers, Harris Brisbane Dick, and Louis V. Bell Funds, Joseph Pulitzer Bequest, and The Annenberg Fund Inc. Gift, 1975
repository: Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York, NY
